name: Demolition Master: Project Implode All
description:
- The most explosive game in the App Store!
- More than 3 million players!
- Prove the whole world that you’re the best demolition man!

In Demolition Master you’ll get into an exciting adventure on 9 locations of the Earth (135 levels) and on 7 locations of the Moon planet (105 levels)!

Altogether there are 16 colorful locations and 240 unique levels.

--- The goal of each mission: using an explosive you need to demolish a construction ---

Dramatic explosions, curious locations worldwide together with charming music, adrenaline, and hunger for victory are among the feeling that the Demolition Master will create for you.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

- PRESS ABOUT THE GAME -

’’With the experimental tone of Angry Birds, Demolition Master is a physics based puzzler that, despite lacking some character, has structure enough inbuilt to entertain for many an hour’’
— 8/10 stars "POCKETGAMER.COM"

’’Demolition Master is a really solid, novel concept with great elements and an already fun gameplay that will appeal to many and keep them coming back for more’’
— 4/5 stars "APPSAFARI.COM"

"If you’re looking for a fun game that’s easy to learn but addictive, then Demolition Master HD is definitely worth adding to your apps list"
— 4/5 stars "PADGADGET.COM"

"Demolition Master’s physics are pretty good"
— 7/10 stars "APPCRAVER.COM"

"What a great idea for a game. It’s really fun"
— APPBANK.US
